content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
This spot took me by surprise! As soon as you walk in, the atmosphere of the restaurant is calm and soothing. The staff and chefs are amazing and take their time and consideration of introducing each plate you order. The head chef has worked at a few Michelin star restaurants so you know the food gon bussin! Highly recommend this joint and gotta call in early to get that reso spot!
